France.

ysis and Machine Intelligence, 28(5):673–683.

(1990).

(1999).
Adaptive background mixture models for real-
time tracking. In IEEE Computer Society Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern

tion. In Ninth International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV 2003), pp. 996–
1003, Nice, France.

903

pp. 1300–1307, Beijing, China.
